metadata.description: Intraday Learning Database - Historical record of all intraday trades for pattern recognition and edge identification
metadata.purpose: Track setup effectiveness, confluence value, and market regime performance. Build database to 50+ trades for reliable statistical conclusions.

vwap_reversion.description: Price extends to VWAP band, triggered by colored arrow (yellow/orange/red), fades extension
vwap_reversion.benchmark: Target: 70%+ win rate based on professional standards

orb_breakout.description: Opening Range Breakout - first 30 min establishes range, entry on break with confirmation
orb_breakout.benchmark: Target: 60-65% win rate in trending markets

c_plus_r_confirmation.description: Close below level + retest confirms breakdown (C+R). Uses Rule #7, #9

fibonacci_pullback.description: Price extends, then pulls back to 50%-61.8% zone at hard level (weekly mid, support)

divergence_reversal.description: Price higher high, momentum lower high (bearish divergence). Requires 3-candle confirmation (Rule #19)
divergence_reversal.benchmark: Target: 70%+ win rate on confirmed divergences

add_neutral.note: Use smaller size when ADD neutral

andy_level_alignment.note: After 10+ sessions, determine Andy's confluence value

trending_vix_below_20.description: VIX <20, ADD persistent direction, strong momentum

volatile_vix_above_25.description: VIX >25, ADD extreme swings, capitulation possible
volatile_vix_above_25.note: Use wider stops, smaller size, wait for 3-bar confirmation

opening_930_1030.description: Opening 30 min + first hour (highest volume, ORB setup optimal)

trend_development_1030_1130.description: Strongest trending period, extension setups work well

lunch_chop_1130_200.description: Reduced volume, whipsaws common - REDUCE SIZE 50%
lunch_chop_1130_200.note: If lunch win rate <50%, consider skipping this session

power_hour_200_345.description: Volume returns, trends resume, pullback setups develop

5_min_scalping.description: Quick reversions, 1-3 bar holds, VWAP optimal
5_min_scalping.benchmark: 70%+ win rate if VWAP red arrow

15_min_swing.description: Structure trades, C+R breakouts, 6-12 bar holds

1_hour_positional.description: Pullbacks to hard levels, overnight holds possible

instructions.how_to_add_trade: After closing signal, Wingman auto-adds to learning_database.json with full details
instructions.what_gets_tracked: Setup type, confluence count, entry/exit, P&L, bars held, market regime, confluences present, checklist compliance
instructions.data_analysis: Every 10 trades, win rate by setup type updates. After 20 trades, regime-specific recommendations emerge. After 50 trades, statistically reliable edge identified.
instructions.continuous_improvement: Every 90 days, compare actual win rates to benchmarks. Adjust rules, deprecate low-win-rate setups, scale high-win-rate setups.
